item.source: Not allowed to Spawn certain items

item.title: Not allowed to Spawn certain items
item.dc:creator: @Sunbred_Rush Sunbred Rush
item.description:
@Sunbred_Rush wrote:

[quote=“Eclipse639, post:2, topic:425985”]Server revision?
I made this for 639, feel free to convert it

public static final int[] unspawnables = {13450, 554, 892, 11212, 9242, 15272, 385, 386, 15273, 9244, 9245, 555, 556, 557, 558, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 566, 9075, 9241, 10566, 10637, 13451, 13452, 13453, 13531, 13532, 13533, 13534, 13535, 13536, 13538, 13539, 13540, 13537, 2422, 14486, 13455, 13456, 13457, 13458, 13459, 19309, 19310, 19312, 19313, 19315, 19316, 19318, 19319, 19321, 19322, 13544, 13545, 13546, 13547, 13548, 13549, 13550, 13551, 13552, 13553, 13554, 13555, 10331, 10333, 10335, 10337, 10339, 10341, 10343, 10345, 10347, 10349, 10351, 10353, 13442, 13739, 13741, 13743, 13745, 13746, 13747, 13748, 13749, 13750, 13751, 13752, 13753, 18786, 19780, 12048, 12044, 12020, 12791, 12040, 12094, 12803, 12787, 12010, 12060, 12779, 12068, 12030, 12435, 12825, 12434, 12824, 12833, 12438}; public static final String[] unspawnablesNames = {"partyhat", "granite", "fist of guthix", "token", "fire cape", "super attack", "super strength", "super restore", "saradomin brew", "super defence", "sigil", "dungeoneering", "h'ween", "death rune", "blood rune", "water rune", "astral", "earth rune", "visage", "santa hat", "corrupt", "zuriel", "statius", "vesta", "morrigan", "gravite", "celestial", "primal", "gorgonite", "hexhunter", "sagittarian", "catalytic", "spiritbloom", "demon horn", "(i)", "promethium", "argonite", "tyrannoleather", "nature"};

::item Command

if (command[0].equals("item")) { if (player.getRights() < 2) { ItemDefinition def = ItemDefinition.forId(Integer.parseInt(command[1])); for(String itemName : unspawnablesNames) { if(def.getName().toLowerCase().contains(itemName)) { player.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } int itemPrice = 0; for(int item : unspawnables) { if(def.getId() == item) { player.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } NumberFormat nf1 = NumberFormat.getInstance(); if (def.getExchangePrice() > 0) { if (command.length == 3) { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice(); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice(); } if (player.getInventory().contains(995, itemPrice)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, itemPrice, true); player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]) ,1); player.sendMessage("You bought a " +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You need "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins to buy this item."); } } } } else { if (command.length == 3) { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1); } } player.getInventory().refresh(); }

I also made a ::sellitem command

if (command[0].equals("sellitem")) { if (player.getRights() < 2) { ItemDefinition def = ItemDefinition.forId(Integer.parseInt(command[1])); for(String itemName : unspawnablesNames) { if(def.getName().toLowerCase().contains(itemName)) { player.sendMessage("You can't sell this item."); return; } } for(int item : unspawnables) { if(def.getId() == item) { player.sendMessage("You can't sell this item."); return; } } int itemPrice = 0; NumberFormat nf1 = NumberFormat.getInstance(); if (command.length == 3) { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1, Integer.parseInt(command[2])); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice() * Integer.parseInt(command[2]); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice() * Integer.parseInt(command[2]); } if (player.getInventory().contains(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2]))) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); player.getInventory().addItem(995, itemPrice); player.sendMessage("You sold a "+(Integer.parseInt(command[2]) == 1 ? Integer.parseInt(command[2])+" x " : "") +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You do not have this item in your inventory."); } } else { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1, 1); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice(); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice(); } if (player.getInventory().contains(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2]))) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); player.getInventory().addItem(995, itemPrice); player.sendMessage("You sold a "+(Integer.parseInt(command[2]) == 1 ? Integer.parseInt(command[2])+" x " : "") +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You do not have this item in your inventory."); } } } else { if (command.length == 3) { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); } else { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1); } } player.getInventory().refresh(); }[/quote]

How do we set the prices? All I did was add in the ::item code, and the default, I noticed, for a divine is 833,800,000

Edit: It appears as though those are the ge prices i.e. “itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice() * Integer.parseInt(command[2])”

How do we customize it to our own?

Read full topic

item.title: Not allowed to Spawn certain items
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Server revision?
I made this for 639, feel free to convert it

public static final int[] unspawnables = {13450, 554, 892, 11212, 9242, 15272, 385, 386, 15273, 9244, 9245, 555, 556, 557, 558, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 566, 9075, 9241, 10566, 10637, 13451, 13452, 13453, 13531, 13532, 13533, 13534, 13535, 13536, 13538, 13539, 13540, 13537, 2422, 14486, 13455, 13456, 13457, 13458, 13459, 19309, 19310, 19312, 19313, 19315, 19316, 19318, 19319, 19321, 19322, 13544, 13545, 13546, 13547, 13548, 13549, 13550, 13551, 13552, 13553, 13554, 13555, 10331, 10333, 10335, 10337, 10339, 10341, 10343, 10345, 10347, 10349, 10351, 10353, 13442, 13739, 13741, 13743, 13745, 13746, 13747, 13748, 13749, 13750, 13751, 13752, 13753, 18786, 19780, 12048, 12044, 12020, 12791, 12040, 12094, 12803, 12787, 12010, 12060, 12779, 12068, 12030, 12435, 12825, 12434, 12824, 12833, 12438}; public static final String[] unspawnablesNames = {"partyhat", "granite", "fist of guthix", "token", "fire cape", "super attack", "super strength", "super restore", "saradomin brew", "super defence", "sigil", "dungeoneering", "h'ween", "death rune", "blood rune", "water rune", "astral", "earth rune", "visage", "santa hat", "corrupt", "zuriel", "statius", "vesta", "morrigan", "gravite", "celestial", "primal", "gorgonite", "hexhunter", "sagittarian", "catalytic", "spiritbloom", "demon horn", "(i)", "promethium", "argonite", "tyrannoleather", "nature"};

::item Command

if (command[0].equals("item")) { if (player.getRights() < 2) { ItemDefinition def = ItemDefinition.forId(Integer.parseInt(command[1])); for(String itemName : unspawnablesNames) { if(def.getName().toLowerCase().contains(itemName)) { player.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } int itemPrice = 0; for(int item : unspawnables) { if(def.getId() == item) { player.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item."); return; } } NumberFormat nf1 = NumberFormat.getInstance(); if (def.getExchangePrice() > 0) { if (command.length == 3) { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice(); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice(); } if (player.getInventory().contains(995, itemPrice)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, itemPrice, true); player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]) ,1); player.sendMessage("You bought a " +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You need "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins to buy this item."); } } } } else { if (command.length == 3) { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1); } } player.getInventory().refresh(); }

I also made a ::sellitem command

if (command[0].equals("sellitem")) { if (player.getRights() < 2) { ItemDefinition def = ItemDefinition.forId(Integer.parseInt(command[1])); for(String itemName : unspawnablesNames) { if(def.getName().toLowerCase().contains(itemName)) { player.sendMessage("You can't sell this item."); return; } } for(int item : unspawnables) { if(def.getId() == item) { player.sendMessage("You can't sell this item."); return; } } int itemPrice = 0; NumberFormat nf1 = NumberFormat.getInstance(); if (command.length == 3) { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1, Integer.parseInt(command[2])); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice() * Integer.parseInt(command[2]); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice() * Integer.parseInt(command[2]); } if (player.getInventory().contains(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2]))) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); player.getInventory().addItem(995, itemPrice); player.sendMessage("You sold a "+(Integer.parseInt(command[2]) == 1 ? Integer.parseInt(command[2])+" x " : "") +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You do not have this item in your inventory."); } } else { if (def.isNoted()) { Item item = new Item(def.getId() == 10843 ? 10828 : def.getId() - 1, 1); itemPrice += item.getDefinition().getExchangePrice(); } else { itemPrice += def.getExchangePrice(); } if (player.getInventory().contains(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2]))) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); player.getInventory().addItem(995, itemPrice); player.sendMessage("You sold a "+(Integer.parseInt(command[2]) == 1 ? Integer.parseInt(command[2])+" x " : "") +def.getName()+" for "+nf1.format(itemPrice)+" coins."); } else { player.sendMessage("You do not have this item in your inventory."); } } } else { if (command.length == 3) { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), Integer.parseInt(command[2])); } else { player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1); } } player.getInventory().refresh(); }

item.title: Not allowed to Spawn certain items
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Working on my ::item command, and i’m trying to make it were you can’t spawn some items so I made an array in ActionHandler

int[] NoSpawnItem = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048, 1050, 1961, 4749, 4753, 4757, 4759, 15284, 15285, 14484, 13899, 13902, 13742, 13742, 13740, 13738, 11728, 11724, 11722, 11720, 11720, 11718, 11708, 11706, 11704, 11702, 11700 }; public int NoSpawnItem() { return NoSpawnItem(int) (Math.random() * NoSpawnItem.length)];

How would I implement into ::item command. Else if statement but whatever I try I get errors.

Thanks Mopar.

Read full topic
